{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3551440,"name":"Chris_Elston","username":"Chris_Elston","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/chris_elston/{size}/256883_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-08T22:00:46.998Z","cooked":"

Just a sanity check, we would like to run a different color CAN BUS wire in our robot to help identify network 1 and network 2 for example. The usual color of CAN BUS is Green and Yellow.

Has any LRI pointed out any problems with running say White and Black twisted pair 24 AWG for another CAN BUS wire color?

Per R624, I don’t see much about CAN BUS colors only voltage wire colors.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-03-08T22:01:09.233Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":14,"reads":106,"readers_count":105,"score":91.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":494786,"topic_slug":"can-bus-wire-color-of-wire-preference-or-issues-with-lri","display_username":"Chris_Elston","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3040,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/can-bus-wire-color-of-wire-preference-or-issues-with-lri/494786/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3551444,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-08T22:10:42.412Z","cooked":"

R624 has the wording you need, though: the color spec is targeted specifically at “non-SIGNAL LEVEL wiring with a constant polarity”. CAN, by definition, is signal-level wiring.

Have at it, though I might suggest something that isn’t going to match with other random wires on the robot.
